title: Cowboys, Rams, Raiders, and Where Colin was right & wrong
itunes:title: Cowboys, Rams, Raiders, and Where Colin was right & wrong
description:
Colin discusses the latest Dallas Cowboys win and what it means, the Chicago Bears beating the Los Angeles Rams, the Oakland Raiders firing GM Reggie McKenzie, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Michael Irvin, Winston Moss, Cris Carter, and Tony Gonzalez.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
